src:
Dizel Maribor je reševal 41-letni vratar
V 16. krogu 1. slovenske nogometne lige zmaga slabega prvaka. Celje je na domačem igrišču napolnilo mrežo kranjskega Triglava.
04 Nov 2019, 10:59 by Gorazd Nejedly



Mariborčani so z igro pošteno razočarali, a so tudi slabi iz Spodnje Šiške odnesli tri točke. FOTO: Blaž Samec



Rok Kronaveter je edini zabil za vijolične, tokrat pa je odnesel žogo pred igralcem Brava Ovbokho Agboyijem. FOTO: Blaž Samec


LJUBLJANA – Če bi nepoučenemu poznavalcu razmerja sil v slovenskem nogometnem prostoru povedali, da sta se v Spodnji Šiški pomerila predzadnji Bravo in branilec naslova in drugi na lestvici Maribor, bi se pošteno stresel. Nemara bi osupnil in ocenil, da je 1. SNL izjemno vznemirljivo prvenstvo, v katerem vsakdo lahko premaga vsakogar.


Rok Kronaveter je edini zabil za vijolične, tokrat pa je odnesel žogo pred igralcem Brava Ovbokho Agboyijem. FOTO: Blaž Samec

To je, recimo tako, pozitivna stran kolajne v minimalni zmagi vijoličnih z 1:0, druga je bolj kruta in pomenljiva. Slovenski prvak Maribor je s petkrat ali še večjim proračunom v 16. krogu do zadnje sekunde trepetal, da je odnesel vse tri točke iz glavnega mesta in proti moštvu, ki je v začetni enajsterici imelo kar pet nogometašev, rojenih v tem tisočletju.Toda to še ni dovolj, da bi lahko natančno pojasnili, kdo je koga premagal, preigral, zasenčil ... Osrednji mož prvaka je bil Jasmin Handanović. Ljubljančan, ki bo 28. januarja prihodnje leto dopolnil že 42 let, je v drugem polčasu preprečil presenečenje in morda preprečil nemir v vijolični hiši.Prva liga Telekom Slovenije1. Olimpija       15       10       3       2       39       :       18       332. Maribor       16       9       4       3       30       :       16       313. Aluminij       15       8       4       3       22       :       11       284. Mura       15       7       7       12       25       :       16       285. Celje       16       7       6       3       32       :       16       276. Tabor       16 5       2 9       20 :       25 177. Domžale       15       4       4       7       20       :       28       168. Triglav       16       4       2       10       21       :       39       149. Bravo       16       3       4       9       19       :       33       1310. Rudar       16 0       6 10       15 :       41 6»Ali je prvi vratar ali drugi? Kakor koli že, odlično je branil, zadovoljen sem zanj, za moštvo, za mojo odločitev. Branil je na visoki ravni, sijajen je bil, ko je kar ujel žogo pri prostem strelu, tudi na koncu tekme je še enkrat odlično posredoval,« je mariborski trener Darko Milanič pohvalil veterana. Bratranec, kot so vijolični navijači pogosto rekli vratarju – je v sorodu s slavnim Interjevim kapetanom Samirjem –, kadar je ušpičil kakšno neumnost v vratih, je pokazal, da lahko kadar koli vskoči in pokaže mlajšemu kolegu Kenanu Piriću, da bo moral veliko trenirati, če bo hotel ohraniti status prvega vratarja. 
Milec Nukiću preprečil gol sezone
Domači osmoljenec je bil Mustafa Nukić. Napadalec z ulično navihanostjo in igrivostjo je eden tistih igralcev, ki je imel smolo in nikoli ni bil na pravem mestu ob pravem času. Prezrli so ga vsi ali pa nihče ni imel dovolj potrpljenja, od trenerjev do klubov, in šele v poznih dvajsetih (3. decembra bo dopolnil 29 let) poskuša ujeti zamujeno. Prav njemu je Jasmin v zadnjih trenutkih tekme ukradel glavno vlogo.Še bliže golu je bil nekaj minut prej, ko je v slalomskem slogu nanizal nekaj Mariborčanov, a mu je na koncu veselje preprečil Martin Milec. Če bi zabil gol, bi bil zagotovo v kombinaciji za najlepšega v sezoni. »Če bi ga zabil, bi bil zdaj v Mariboru,« je še navihano odgovoril. Maribor na dizelskih pogon je izkoristil izkušnje in kilometrino, saj je do matne akcije prišel zaradi napake 19-letnega Žana Trontlja.Ta je izgubil žogo na sredini igrišča, v nasprotnem napadu pa sta Rok Kronaveter in Dino Hotić rutinirano opravila še z Darkom Zecem in 18-letnim vratarjem Domnom Grilom. »Lahko smo zadovoljni, saj so fantje dali vse od sebe, bili povezani. Včasih se je treba prilagoditi položaju, našemu stanju, a tudi stanju igrišča, tekmeca. Tokrat je takšen način prinesel tako želene tri točke,« je zares igralno skromno podobo Maribora na igrišču opravičil Milanič in pojasnil, da je na izbor taktike in pristopa vplivala sežanska lekcija.Koper povišal prednostIzidi 16. kroga 2. SNL: Koper : Krka 4:0, Beltinci Klima Tratnjek : Gorica 2:1, Roltek Dob : Fužinar Vzajemci 1:0, Brežice Terme Čatež : Nafta 1903 0:0, Kalcer Radomlje : Krško 3:1, Vitanest Bilje : Rogaška 1:1, Drava Dakinda Ptuj : Jadran Dekani 0:1, Koroška Dravograd : Brda 2:2; vrstni red: Koper 37, Gorica in Radomlje po 32, Nafta 30, Bilje 28, Krško in Fužinar po 27, Krka 24, Dob 21, Jadran 19, Drava in Beltinci po 17, Brda in Rogaška po 11, Brežice 10, Koroška Dravograd 9.Domači trener Dejan Grabić je bil lahko upravičeno razočaran, čeprav je izzival nesrečo, ker je pogumno zaupal mladim igralcem. »Zaslužili smo si vsaj točko. Veliko priložnosti smo si priigrali, obenem smo Mariboru dopustili zelo malo. Zato smo razočarani. Igramo za točke in jih krvavo potrebujemo. Maribor ni bil zaman tako uspešen v preteklosti. Do potankosti se igralci držijo nalog in taktičnih načrtov. Zato je dober, mi pa se tega še učimo,« je razliko med moštvom opisal Grabić, ki tako kot mladi igralci tudi sam v vlogi trenerja nabira prvoligaške izkušnje. 
Celjska štirica za desetico
Pred dvobojem Celja in Triglava je bilo nekaj neznank ali pomislekov, po njem nič. Triglav je bil za Celje znova hvaležna stranka. Celjani so prvi zmagi v sezoni s pol ducata žog v kranjski mreži dodali še drugo s štirimi žogami.Sežančani v izdihljajih tekme do točke Izidi 16. kroga 1. SNL: Bravo : Maribor 0:1 (1250 gledalcev, Rok Kronaveter, 24.), Celje : Triglav 4:0 (400 gledalcev; Ivan Božić 17., Tadej Vidmajer 39., 64., Dario Vizinger 89.), CherryBox24 Tabor Sežana : Rudar 1:1 (400 gledalcev; Predrag Sikimić 90+2-11 m; Dominik Radić 65.; rdeči karton za igralca Rudarja Marka Ćosića v 68. minuti), Mura : Olimpija, Aluminij : Domžale (večerni tekmi). Pari 17. kroga: Rudar : Celje (sobota ob 14.45), Maribor : Domžale (sobota, 16.55), Triglav : Bravo (nedelja ob 14.00), Olimpija – CherryBox24 Tabor Sežana (nedelja, 16.45), Mura : Aluminij (nedelja ob 19.00).»Bili smo v krču, zmago smo potrebovali. Ni bila preprosta, je pa bila zaslužena,« je z zadovoljstvom povedal domači trener Dušan Kosić, njegov gorenjski kolega Vlado Šmit pa je bil precej kratek: »V prvem polčasu smo prejeli lekcijo. Kar nas je odlikovalo v zadnjih tekmah, tega ni bilo,« je bil iskren.
text:
The 41-year-old goalkeeper saved Diesel Maribor
In the 16th round of the 1st Slovenian Football League the bad champion wins. Celje filled the network of Carniola Triglav on the home pitch.
04 Nov 2019, 10:59 by Gorazd Nejedly



The Mariborans were disappointing with the game, but the poor from Spodnja Šiška also scored three points. PHOTO: Blaz Samec



Rok Kronaveter only scored for the Purple, this time taking the ball in front of Brava player Ovbokho Agboyi. PHOTO: Blaz Samec


LJUBLJANA - If you were told by an unskilled expert on the relationship of forces in the Slovenian football field that penultimate Bravo and the defending champion and others on the Maribor ladder were moving in Spodnja Šiška, it would be a real shake. I would probably be amazed and consider the 1st SNL to be an extremely exciting championship in which anyone can beat anyone.


Rok Kronaveter only scored for the Purple, this time taking the ball in front of Brava player Ovbokho Agboyi. PHOTO: Blaz Samec

This is, let's just say, the positive side of the collage in a minimum win of the purple with 1: 0, the other is more rigid and significant. Slovenian champion Maribor, with five or more budgets in the 16th round, trembled until the last second to take away all three points from the capital and against a team that had as many as five footballers born in this initial millennium. it is not enough to be able to explain exactly who beat, overplayed, overshadowed ... The central champion was Jasmin Handanovic. The Ljubljana man, who will turn 42 on January 28 next year, prevented a surprise in the second half and possibly prevented a turmoil in the purple house.The first league of Telekom Slovenije1. Olimpija 15 10 3 2 39: 18 332. Maribor 16 9 4 3 30: 16 313. Aluminum 15 8 4 3 22: 11 284. Mura 15 7 7 12 25: 16 285. Celje 16 7 6 3 32: 16 276. Tabor 16 5 2 9 20: 25 177. Domzale 15 4 4 7 20: 28 168. Triglav 16 4 2 10 21: 39 149. Bravo 16 3 4 9 19 33 1310. Rudar 16 0 6 10 15 41 6 "Is the first keeper or the other? Anyway, he defended perfectly, I am pleased for him, for the team, for my decision. He defended at a high level, he was brilliant when he caught the ball at free-kick, and at the end of the match he once again excelled, "Maribor coach Darko Milanic praised the veteran. The cousin, as the purple fans often said to the goalkeeper - is related to the famous Inter captain Samir - when he whispered some nonsense in the door, he showed that he could jump in at any time and show his younger colleague Kenan Pirić that he would have to train a lot if will want to maintain the status of first goalkeeper.
Milec prevented Nukic from scoring a season
The home runner was Mustafa Nukić. The street-striker and playful striker is one of those players who has had pitch and has never been in the right place at the right time. He has been ignored by everyone or no one has had enough patience, from coaches to clubs, and is only in his late twenties (he will turn 29 on December 3rd) trying to catch up. It was Jasmine who stole the lead in the final moments of the match. He was even closer to the goal a few minutes earlier, when he scored a few Mariborians in the slalom style, but was eventually prevented by Martin Milec. If he scored, he would certainly be in the mix for the best of the season. "If I had stabbed him, I would be in Maribor now," he replied curtly. Diesel-powered Maribor took advantage of the experience and the mileage as it came to the mat campaign due to a mistake by 19-year-old Jean Trontelj. He lost the ball in the middle of the pitch, while Rok Kronaveter and Dino Hotic routinely made a run with Dark Rabbit and 18. summer goalkeeper Dom Grill. “We can be happy, because the boys did their best and were connected. Sometimes it is necessary to adjust to the situation, our condition, but also the state of the pitch, the competitor. This time he made the three points he wanted so much, "Milanic really exclaimed the playfully modest image of Maribor on the pitch, explaining that the choice of tactics and approach was influenced by the Sežana lesson. Koper increased the advantageResults of Round 16 2. SNL: Koper: Krka 4: 0, Beltinci Climate Tratnjek: Gorizia 2: 1, Roltek Age: Fuzinar Vzajemci 1: 0, Brezice Terme Catez: Nafta 1903 0: 0, Kalcer Radomlje: Krsko 3: 1, Vitanest Herbs: Rogaska 1: 1, Drava Dakinda Ptuj: Jadran Dekani 0: 1, Carinthia Dravograd: Brda 2: 2; order: Koper 37, Gorica and Radomlje after 32, Nafta 30, Bilje 28, Krško and Fužinar after 27, Krka 24, Dob 21, Jadran 19, Drava and Beltinci after 17, Brda and Rogaška after 11, Brežice 10, Carinthia Dravograd 9.Home coach Dejan Grabić may have been justifiably disappointed, even though he caused misfortune by having the courage to trust young players. “We deserved at least a point. We won a lot of opportunities, while we allowed very little in Maribor. That is why we are disappointed. We play for points and we bloody need them. Maribor has not been so successful in the past. To the point, players stick to tasks and tactical plans. That's why he is good, and we are still learning that, "described the difference between the team, as Grabic, who, as a young player, also has first-team experience as a coach.
Celje four by ten
Before the Celje and Triglav duel there were some unknowns or concerns, nothing after him. Triglav was once again grateful to Celje. Celje citizens added their first wins of the season with half a dozen balls in the Carniolan net with another four balls. The villagers exhaled the game to the end of Round 16 of the 1st SNL: Bravo: Maribor 0: 1 (1250 spectators, Rok Kronaveter, 24.) , Celje: Triglav 4: 0 (400 spectators; Ivan Božić 17th, Tadej Vidmajer 39th, 64th, Dario Vizinger 89th), CherryBox24 Sežana camp: Rudar 1: 1 (400 spectators; Predrag Sikimić 90 + 2-11 m ; Dominik Radic 65; red card for Rudar Mark Cosic player in the 68th minute), Mura: Olympia, Aluminum: Domzale (evening matches). Round 17 couples: Miner: Celje (Saturday at 14.45), Maribor: Domžale (Saturday, 16.55), Triglav: Bravo (Sunday at 14.00), Olympia - CherryBox24 Sežana Camp (Sunday, 16.45), Mura: Aluminum (Sunday at 19.00 "We were in a crunch, we needed a win. It was not easy, but it was well deserved, "said home coach Dusan Kosic with pleasure, and his Gorenje colleague Vlado Schmitt was rather short:" We received a lesson in the first half. What has distinguished us in recent games has not been that, "he was honest.
